#summary Golf Markup Language Reference: Hole.

= Description =

The Hole element describe a playable hole of golf on a course.
It contains information common to all [[Tees]].

The Hole element does not contain information about the playable [[Tees]], distances, par, etc.

= Attributes =

# number - Hole number. Mandatory to properly order holes on a golf course.
